title: Advanced Biomaterials
description: Advanced topics of biomaterials performance and engineering, including biointerfaces, host reactions of materials, and bio-inspired/smart-materials strategies. Crosslisted with BMED, ME, and MSE 6777.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BMED 6776 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHBE 6776 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 6776 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 6776 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PTFE 6776 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
